all_features_implemented.detail: EXEMPT_ACTIONS Set and action verb parsing added to gate-blocker.cjs and iteration-corridor.cjs per FR-001 through FR-004

unit_test_coverage_80_pct.detail: 14 new tests covering 100% of new code branches (exempt path, fall-through path, flags, empty args, regression verbs)

all_tests_passing.detail: gate-blocker: 71/72 pass (1 pre-existing failure). iteration-corridor: 40/40 pass. Full hooks suite: 2379/2381 (2 pre-existing failures)

code_follows_linting_standards.detail: Code follows existing CJS patterns, JSDoc comments, debugLog conventions

type_checking_passes.detail: CJS hooks do not use TypeScript

implementation_matches_design.detail: Implementation matches module-design.md exactly: EXEMPT_ACTIONS Set, regex pattern, placement after setup check and before advance/gate check

history.action: Added EXEMPT_ACTIONS and action verb parsing to gate-blocker.cjs and iteration-corridor.cjs; wrote 14 tests
